description.english: Raise a Skill to Mastery Level 20
Raise a Character to Ascendancy Level 50
Loot or Auto Scrap 500 Mythical Items
Reach Expertise Level 50 with a Map
Defeat the Dragon Emperor or Empress
Reroll the attributes of an Item 500 times
Randomise the attribute ranks of an Item 250 times
Loot or Auto Scrap 25 Mythical Tools
Obtain the Jewel Of The Empire
Obtain the Heart Of The Abyss
Upgrade a Paragon Item to level 10
Complete 100 Agony Missions at Agony Level 10
Obtain 250 Bonus Chests from infusing Agony Missions
Loot or Auto Scrap 100 Soul Tools
Loot or Auto Scrap 25 Mythical Soul Tools
Obtain 60 different Agony Mission Exclusive Items
Fully upgrade the Domain of Agony
Loot or Auto Scrap 35 different Divine Items
Reach Hero status with the Dwarven Rebellion
Reach Hero status with the Riverfoot Clan
Reach Hero status with the Elemental Conclave
Reach Hero status with the Druidic Council
Grant an Item the Blessing of 4 different Factions
Upgrade a Unique Item to Rank 4
Loot or Auto Scrap 25 different Raid exclusive Divine Items
Clear the Endless Spires at Monster Level 250
Clear the Endless Corridors at Monster Level 250
Clear the Endless Wastes at Monster Level 250
Clear the Endless Depths at Monster Level 250
Loot or Auto Scrap 20 different Endless exclusive Divine Items
